name: Find-a-Signal
description:
In this game Internet was banned. You play as an internet addicted guy, who is trying to download some dank memes, while running from the police.

Controls:

The game supports both Mouse/Keyboard and Gamepad

ActionMouse/KeyboardGamepadRunningWASDLeft Stick
KickLeft mouse button/
Space
XSelectLeft mouse buttonA

Credits:

All the assets except for sound are done by me (SandEbru) for 3 days

Sounds are taken from opengameart.org and have CC0 license

The game is developed using GodotEngine

I made this game for Mini Jam 47 (https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-47-internet)

Have Fun!
